recordFailed() - Method in class org.example.TestStatistics
Records a failed test by incrementing the failed test count.
recordPassed() - Method in class org.example.TestStatistics
Records a passed test by incrementing the passed test count.
runTests(Class<?>, TestStatistics) - Method in class org.example.TestRunner
Runs all test methods marked with @Test in the given class, updating the provided statistics object with pass/fail results.
